00021 // affy/sdk/file5/File5_Tsv.h ---

00023 // $Id: File5_Tsv.h,v 1.33 2009-10-28 19:06:41 csugne Exp $

00025 //
00026 // @file   File5_Tsv.h
00027 // @brief  Headers for the File5_Tsv classes.
00028 
00029 /*
00030   We would like to store TsvFile like data in an HDF5
00031   formated file.  To accommodate the features of TsvFile in
00032   an HDF5 file, we keep each column in its own vector and
00033   use the curent "line" to figure out which level is being
00034   looked at and the offset into that set of tables.
00035 
00036   The column isnt in "tsv_lvl_idx", maps the current line to
00037   the correct level table and index into that table.
00038 
00039 | LINE   LVL-IDX       | COL-0-0  COL-1-0    COL-2-0
00040 +-----------------------+----------------------------
00041 | 0       0-0          |foo
00042 | 1       0-1          |bar
00043 | 2       0-2          |baz
00044 | 3       1-0          |        level1
00045 | 4       1-1          |        level1-again
00046 | 5       1-2          |        level1-once more
00047 | 6       2-0          |                      lvl-2
00048 | 7       2-1          |                      lvl-2
00049 
00050 col-${level_}-${column_idx}
00051 
00052 NOTES:
00053 
00054 * The tsvFile shouldnt be a "File" it should be a "group" or "set"
00055 For organizing File5TsvColumns
00056 
00057 */
00058 
00059 #ifndef _FILE5_TSV_H_
00060 #define _FILE5_TSV_H_
00061

00093   //
00094   File5_TsvColumn();

00100   int close();
00101   virtual char file5_kind_char();

00103   //
00104   std::string getColumnName();

00107   int set_s(short val);
00108   int set_i(int val);
00109   int set_f(float val);
00110   int set_d(double val);
00111   int set_string(const std::string& val);
00112 
00113   //
00114   int push_back_val();
00115 
00116   //
00117   int open(const std::string& name);

00119            const std::string& cname,
00120            int clvl,
00121            int cidx,
00122            affx::File5_dtype_t ctype,
00123            int flags);
00124   //
00125   int dump();
00126 };
